description: Pain, infertility, respiratory conditions, anxiety, depression, skin conditions and more! Expert practitioner with 30+ years experience. Call today 905-901-9522.
cleaned_text: top of page Home: Welcome WELCOME TO ACUPUNCTURE AND HERBS Heal your body, naturally. Acupuncture and Herbs specializes in Chinese medicine services, and treats all patients with the utmost respect and care. With over 30 years of experience, we offer alternative healthcare to support your healing path to wellness. Based on your physical and psychological conditions, we evaluate the best treatment options available for you. Let us know how we can help you and we'll make sure you receive the best treatment Oakville can offer.
